00012 /**
00013 * @brief Initialization of orientation dialog.
00014 * @param aTensor The tensor that will change.
00015 * @param aOpenGL The OpenGL panel which will be redrawn in every update.
00016 * @param aCheck Special fuction that control the update
00017 */
00018 void SpinachGUI::OrientationDialog::Initialization(Tensor^% aTensor, OpenGLForm::COpenGL^% aOpenGL, Check^ aCheck)
00019 {
00020         //set the parameters of the interaction, OpenGl and update function
00021         tensor=aTensor;
00022         OpenGL=aOpenGL;
00023         nAtom=tensor->A;
00024         ID=tensor->ID;
00025         unit=tensor->unit;
00026         refID=tensor->Frame->getID();
00027         InterKind=tensor->IntKind;
00028         Update=aCheck;
00029 
00030         //Construct spherical  matrices of different forms
00031         Re_Spherical_Tens=new double[9];
00032         Im_Spherical_Tens=new double[9];
00033         Interact_Mat=gcnew ::Matrix3x3();
00034         eigenvec=gcnew ObservableCollection<double>();
00035         eigenval=gcnew ObservableCollection<double>();
00036 
00037         //Set theXY,XZ,YY,YZ,ZZ elemtns textboxes disable for j-couplings and exchange interactions
00038         if(InterKind==InteractionKind::Jcoupling || InterKind==InteractionKind::Exchange)
00039         {
00040                 textBoxXYTensor->Enabled=false;
00041                 textBoxXZTensor->Enabled=false;
00042                 textBoxYYTensor->Enabled=false;
00043                 textBoxYZTensor->Enabled=false;
00044                 textBoxZZTensor->Enabled=false;
00045         } 
00046         else
00047         {
00048                 textBoxXYTensor->Enabled=true;
00049                 textBoxXZTensor->Enabled=true;
00050                 textBoxYYTensor->Enabled=true;
00051                 textBoxYZTensor->Enabled=true;
00052                 textBoxZZTensor->Enabled=true;
00053         } 
00054 
00055         //Initialize tensor, eigen values and dcm
00056         //In order to not use the automatic update
00057         for (int i=0;i<9;i++)
00058         {
00059                 Interact_Mat[i]=tensor->matrix3x3[i];
00060                 eigenvec->Add(tensor->dcm[i]);
00061         }
00062         eigenval->Add(tensor->eigen[0]);
00063         eigenval->Add(tensor->eigen[1]);
00064         eigenval->Add(tensor->eigen[2]);
00065 
00066         //if interaction is chemical shift appear at specific position and set the textbox
00067         if(InterKind==InteractionKind::Shift)
00068         {
00069                 groupBox1->Width=groupBox1->Width+270;
00070                 Referencelabel->Visible=true;
00071                 ReferencetextBox->Visible=true;
00072                 ReferencetextBox->Text=tensor->reference;
00073         }
00074 
00075         //Calculate and update all textboxes
00076         UpdateAll();
00077 }

00081 /**
00082 * @brief EventHandler for text inside interaction tensor matrix.
00083 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
00084 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
00085 */
00086 System::Void SpinachGUI::OrientationDialog::InteractionMatrix_KeyPress(System::Object^  sender, KeyPressEventArgs^  e) 
00087 {
00088         //If key pressed is not number, or .  or - or backspace or enter do nothing
00089         if (!Char::IsNumber(e->KeyChar) && e->KeyChar != '.' && e->KeyChar != '-' && e->KeyChar != '\b' && e->KeyChar !=(char)13)
00090         {
00091                 e->Handled = true;
00092         }
00093         else
00094         {
00095                 //When enter is hitted
00096                 if (e->KeyChar ==(char)13)
00097                 {
00098                         double result;
00099 
00100                         //if valid number is entered
00101                         if(Double::TryParse(((TextBox^)sender)->Text, result))
00102                         {
00103                                 //Returned to original color of the textbox
00104                                 ((TextBox^)sender)->BackColor=System::Drawing::SystemColors::Window;
00105 
00106                                 //Depending the tag of the text box, update the interaction matrix
00107                                 switch(Convert::ToInt32((String^)(((TextBox^)sender)->Tag))) {
00108                                 case 1: //for XX
00109 
00110                                         //Convert to double
00111                                         Interact_Mat[0]=Convert::ToDouble(((TextBox^)sender)->Text);
00112 
00113                                         //If j-coupling or exchange interaction the YY and ZZ textboes 
00114                                         //will be locked so update them automaticaly
00115                                         if(InterKind==InteractionKind::Jcoupling || InterKind==InteractionKind::Exchange)
00116                                         {
00117                                                 Interact_Mat[4]=Convert::ToDouble(((TextBox^)sender)->Text);
00118                                                 Interact_Mat[8]=Convert::ToDouble(((TextBox^)sender)->Text);
00119                                         }
00120                                         break;
00121                                 case 2: //For XY, convert to double and update automatically YX
00122                                         Interact_Mat[1]=Convert::ToDouble(((TextBox^)sender)->Text);
00123                                         Interact_Mat[3]=Convert::ToDouble(((TextBox^)sender)->Text);
00124                                         break;
00125                                 case 3://For XZ, convert to double and update automatically ZX
00126                                         Interact_Mat[2]=Convert::ToDouble(((TextBox^)sender)->Text);
00127                                         Interact_Mat[6]=Convert::ToDouble(((TextBox^)sender)->Text);
00128                                         break;
00129                                 case 4: //For YY, convert to double
00130                                         Interact_Mat[4]=Convert::ToDouble(((TextBox^)sender)->Text);
00131                                         break;
00132                                 case 5: //For YZ, convert to double and update automatically ZY
00133                                         Interact_Mat[5]=Convert::ToDouble(((TextBox^)sender)->Text);
00134                                         Interact_Mat[7]=Convert::ToDouble(((TextBox^)sender)->Text);
00135                                         break;
00136                                 case 6: //For ZZ, convert to double
00137                                         Interact_Mat[8]=Convert::ToDouble(((TextBox^)sender)->Text);
00138                                         break;
00139                                 };
00140 
00141                                 //Update the text boxes, if jcoupling or exchange interaction only YY and ZZ
00142                                 if(InterKind==InteractionKind::Jcoupling || InterKind==InteractionKind::Exchange)
00143                                 {
00144                                         textBoxYYTensor->Text=Convert::ToString(Interact_Mat[0]);
00145                                         textBoxZZTensor->Text=Convert::ToString(Interact_Mat[0]);
00146                                 } //Update the text boxes for XY,ZX,ZY
00147                                 else
00148                                 {
00149                                         textBoxYXTensor->Text=Convert::ToString(Interact_Mat[3]);
00150                                         textBoxZXTensor->Text=Convert::ToString(Interact_Mat[6]);
00151                                         textBoxZYTensor->Text=Convert::ToString(Interact_Mat[7]);
00152                                 }
00153 
00154                                 //Calculate all the forms and update the text boxes, the model and 3d model
00155                                 Calculate_Eigen();
00156                                 UpdateInteraction();
00157                                 UpdateEigenState();
00158                                 UpdateIsotropic();
00159                                 UpdateSphericaTensor();
00160                                 CreateOrient();
00161                                 UpdateEulerAngles();
00162                                 UpdateWignerMatrix();
00163                                 UpdateQuaternion();
00164                                 UpdateAngleAxis();
00165                                 UpdateParameters();
00166                                 UpdateModel();
00167                         }//if not valid number do nothing
00168                         else e->Handled = true;
00169                 }//When normal writing is happenning the Textbox color change to blue
00170                 else ((TextBox^)sender)->BackColor=System::Drawing::SystemColors::Highlight;
00171         };
00172 }

00174 /**
00175 * @brief EventHandler for text inside Euler angles boxes.
00176 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
00177 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
00178 */
00179 System::Void SpinachGUI::OrientationDialog::textBoxeuler_KeyPress(System::Object^  sender, System::Windows::Forms::KeyPressEventArgs^  e) 
00180 {
00181         //If key pressed is not number, or .  or - or backspace or enter do nothing
00182         if (!Char::IsNumber(e->KeyChar) && e->KeyChar != '.' && e->KeyChar != '-' && e->KeyChar != '\b' && e->KeyChar !=(char)13)
00183         {
00184                 e->Handled = true;
00185         }
00186         else
00187         {
00188                 //When enter is hitted
00189                 if (e->KeyChar ==(char)13)
00190                 {
00191                         double textfield;
00192 
00193                         //if valid number is entered
00194                         if(Double::TryParse(((TextBox^)sender)->Text, textfield))
00195                         {
00196                                 //Returned to original color of the textbox 
00197                                 ((TextBox^)sender)->BackColor=System::Drawing::SystemColors::Window;
00198 
00199                                 //Depending the tag of the text box, update the euler angles
00200                                 switch(Convert::ToInt32((String^)(((TextBox^)sender)->Tag))) {
00201                                 case 1://alpha
00202                                         alpha=textfield;
00203                                         break;
00204                                 case 2://beta
00205                                         beta=textfield;
00206                                         break;
00207                                 case 3://gamma
00208                                         gamma=textfield;
00209                                         break;
00210                                 };
00211 
00212                                 //In order to work correcly, according to Spinach, convert to gradiants
00213                                 nOrient= gcnew SpinachGUI::Orientation(gcnew EulerAngles(gamma*PI/180.0f,beta*PI/180.0f,alpha*PI/180.0f));
00214 
00215                                 //Convert to dcm
00216                                 Matrix3x3^ dc=nOrient->GetAsDCM();
00217 
00218                                 //Update dcm matrix
00219                                 eigenvec[0]=dc->xx;
00220                                 eigenvec[1]=dc->xy;
00221                                 eigenvec[2]=dc->xz;
00222                                 eigenvec[3]=dc->yx;
00223                                 eigenvec[4]=dc->yy;
00224                                 eigenvec[5]=dc->yz;
00225                                 eigenvec[6]=dc->zx;
00226                                 eigenvec[7]=dc->zy;
00227                                 eigenvec[8]=dc->zz;
00228 
00229                                 //Calculate all the forms and update the text boxes, the model and 3d model
00230                                 Calculate_TensorfromEigen();
00231                                 UpdateInteraction();
00232                                 UpdateEigenState();
00233                                 UpdateIsotropic();
00234                                 UpdateSphericaTensor();
00235                                 UpdateWignerMatrix();
00236                                 UpdateQuaternion();
00237                                 UpdateAngleAxis();
00238                                 UpdateModel();
00239 
00240                         }//if not valid number do nothing
00241                         else e->Handled = true;
00242                 }//When normal writing is happenning the Textbox color change to blue
00243                 else ((TextBox^)sender)->BackColor=System::Drawing::SystemColors::Highlight;
00244         };
00245 }

00247 /**
00248 * @brief EventHandler for text inside Spherical tensor boxes.
00249 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
00250 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
00251 */
00252 System::Void SpinachGUI::OrientationDialog::textBoxSpherical_KeyPress(System::Object^  sender, System::Windows::Forms::KeyPressEventArgs^  e) 
00253 {
00254         //save tag of texbox
00255         int texttag=Convert::ToInt32((String^)(((TextBox^)sender)->Tag));
00256 
00257         //If key pressed is not number, or .  or - or backspace or enter do nothing
00258         if (!Char::IsNumber(e->KeyChar) && e->KeyChar != '.' && e->KeyChar != '-' && e->KeyChar != '\b' && e->KeyChar !=(char)13)
00259         {
00260                 e->Handled = true;
00261         }
00262         else
00263         {
00264                 //When enter is hitted
00265                 if (e->KeyChar ==(char)13)
00266                 {
00267                         double textfield;
00268 
00269                         //if valid number is entered
00270                         if(Double::TryParse(((TextBox^)sender)->Text, textfield))
00271                         {
00272                                 //Returned to original color of the textbox
00273                                 ((TextBox^)sender)->BackColor=System::Drawing::SystemColors::Window;
00274 
00275                                 //if the tag is even number the real part will saved else the imaginary
00276                                 if(texttag%2==0) Re_Spherical_Tens[texttag/2]= textfield;
00277                                 else Im_Spherical_Tens[texttag/2]= textfield;
00278 
00279                                 //Update Symmetrical terms
00280                                 textBoxSpherical2n1R->Text= To_String(Re_Spherical_Tens[7]=-Re_Spherical_Tens[5]);
00281                                 textBoxSpherical2n1I->Text= To_String(Im_Spherical_Tens[7]=Im_Spherical_Tens[5]);
00282                                 textBoxSpherical2n2R->Text= To_String(Re_Spherical_Tens[8]=Re_Spherical_Tens[4]);
00283                                 textBoxSpherical2n2I->Text= To_String(Im_Spherical_Tens[8]=-Im_Spherical_Tens[4]);
00284 
00285                                 //if all of this expression are different from 0 then the tensor matrix will imaginary, not good
00286                                 if( (3.0f* Im_Spherical_Tens[4] - sqrt(6.0f)* Im_Spherical_Tens[6] + 3.0f* Im_Spherical_Tens[8])/6.0f!=0 &&
00287                                         (sqrt(2.0f)*Re_Spherical_Tens[2] + Re_Spherical_Tens[4] - Re_Spherical_Tens[8])/2.0f!=0 &&
00288                                         (Im_Spherical_Tens[1]+Im_Spherical_Tens[3] -Im_Spherical_Tens[5]+ Im_Spherical_Tens[7])/2.0f!=0 &&
00289                                         (-sqrt(2.0f)* Re_Spherical_Tens[2] + Re_Spherical_Tens[4] - Re_Spherical_Tens[8])/2.0f!=0 &&
00290                                         (- 3.0f* Im_Spherical_Tens[4] -sqrt(6.0f)*Im_Spherical_Tens[6]- 3.0f* Im_Spherical_Tens[8])/6.0f!=0 &&
00291                                         (Re_Spherical_Tens[1]-Re_Spherical_Tens[3] -Re_Spherical_Tens[5]- Re_Spherical_Tens[7])/2.0f!=0 &&
00292                                         (-Im_Spherical_Tens[1] - Im_Spherical_Tens[3] -Im_Spherical_Tens[5] + Im_Spherical_Tens[7])/2.0f!=0 &&
00293                                         (-Re_Spherical_Tens[1] + Re_Spherical_Tens[3] -Re_Spherical_Tens[5] + Re_Spherical_Tens[7])/2.0f!=0 &&
00294                                         -sqrt(2.0f/3.0f)*Im_Spherical_Tens[6]!=0) 
00295                                 {
00296                                         System::Windows::Forms::MessageBox::Show("Complex Interaction Matrix Element", "Error", 
00297                                                 System::Windows::Forms::MessageBoxButtons::OK,
00298                                                 System::Windows::Forms::MessageBoxIcon::Error);}
00299                                 else //if the above conditio is false, we can have real tensor
00300                                 {
00301                                         //Calculation of XX from the spherical tensor
00302                                         Interact_Mat[0]=(-2.0f*sqrt(3.0f)*Re_Spherical_Tens[0] + 3.0f*Re_Spherical_Tens[4] 
00303                                         -sqrt(6.0f)*Re_Spherical_Tens[6] + 3.0f*Re_Spherical_Tens[8])/6.0f;
00304 
00305                                         //Calculation of XY from the spherical tensor
00306                                         Interact_Mat[1]=(-sqrt(2.0f)* Im_Spherical_Tens[2]- Im_Spherical_Tens[4]+ 
00307                                                 Im_Spherical_Tens[8] )/2.0f;
00308 
00309                                         //Calculation of XZ from the spherical tensor
00310                                         Interact_Mat[2]=(Re_Spherical_Tens[1] + Re_Spherical_Tens[3] 
00311                                         - Re_Spherical_Tens[5] + Re_Spherical_Tens[7])/2.0f;
00312 
00313                                         //Calculation of YX from the spherical tensor
00314                                         Interact_Mat[3]=(sqrt(2.0f)* Im_Spherical_Tens[2] - Im_Spherical_Tens[4] + 
00315                                                 Im_Spherical_Tens[8])/2.0f;
00316 
00317                                         //Calculation of YY from the spherical tensor
00318                                         Interact_Mat[4]= (-2.0f*sqrt(3.0f)*Re_Spherical_Tens[0]- 3.0f* Re_Spherical_Tens[4] - 
00319                                                 sqrt(6.0f)*Re_Spherical_Tens[6]- 3.0f* Re_Spherical_Tens[8])/6.0f;
00320 
00321                                         //Calculation of YZ from the spherical tensor
00322                                         Interact_Mat[5]=(-Im_Spherical_Tens[1] + Im_Spherical_Tens[3]
00323                                         +Im_Spherical_Tens[5] + Im_Spherical_Tens[7])/2.0f;
00324 
00325                                         //Calculation of ZX from the spherical tensor
00326                                         Interact_Mat[6]=(-Re_Spherical_Tens[1] - Re_Spherical_Tens[3] 
00327                                         -Re_Spherical_Tens[5] + Re_Spherical_Tens[7])/2.0f;
00328 
00329                                         //Calculation of ZY from the spherical tensor
00330                                         Interact_Mat[7]=(Im_Spherical_Tens[1] - Im_Spherical_Tens[3]
00331                                         +Im_Spherical_Tens[5] + Im_Spherical_Tens[7])/2.0f;
00332 
00333                                         //Calculation of ZZ from the spherical tensor
00334                                         Interact_Mat[8]=(-Re_Spherical_Tens[0]+sqrt(2.0f)*Re_Spherical_Tens[6])/sqrt(3.0);
00335 
00336                                         //Calculate all the forms and update the text boxes, the model and 3d model
00337                                         Calculate_Eigen();
00338                                         UpdateInteraction();
00339                                         UpdateEigenState();
00340                                         UpdateIsotropic();
00341                                         CreateOrient();
00342                                         UpdateEulerAngles();
00343                                         UpdateWignerMatrix();
00344                                         UpdateQuaternion();
00345                                         UpdateAngleAxis();
00346                                         UpdateParameters();
00347                                         UpdateModel();
00348                                         UpdateSphericaTensor();
00349                                 };
00350                         }//if not valid number do nothing
00351                         else e->Handled = true;
00352                 }//When normal writing is happenning the Textbox color change to blue
00353                 else ((TextBox^)sender)->BackColor=System::Drawing::SystemColors::Highlight;
00354         };
00355 }

00497

00500                                 Interact_Mat[0]+=Convert::ToDouble(((TextBox^)sender)->Text)-trace;

00502                                 Interact_Mat[8]+=Convert::ToDouble(((TextBox^)sender)->Text)-trace;

00527 /**
00528 * @brief Function for updating interaction tensor matrix textboxes.
00529 */
00530 void SpinachGUI::OrientationDialog::UpdateInteraction()
00531 {
00532         InteractionText=gcnew String("interactionmatrix=[ ");
00533 
00534         //set the interaction tensor matrix textboxes
00535         textBoxXXTensor->Text= To_String(Interact_Mat[0]);
00536         textBoxXYTensor->Text= To_String(Interact_Mat[1]);
00537         textBoxXZTensor->Text= To_String(Interact_Mat[2]);
00538         textBoxYXTensor->Text= To_String(Interact_Mat[3]);
00539         textBoxYYTensor->Text= To_String(Interact_Mat[4]);
00540         textBoxYZTensor->Text= To_String(Interact_Mat[5]);
00541         textBoxZXTensor->Text= To_String(Interact_Mat[6]);
00542         textBoxZYTensor->Text= To_String(Interact_Mat[7]);
00543         textBoxZZTensor->Text= To_String(Interact_Mat[8]);
00544 
00545 
00546         //Writing to matlab format
00547         InteractionText+=To_StringE(Interact_Mat[0])+" "+To_StringE(Interact_Mat[1])+" "+To_StringE(Interact_Mat[2])+"\r\n"+
00548                 "                    "+To_StringE(Interact_Mat[3])+" "+To_StringE(Interact_Mat[4])+" "+To_StringE(Interact_Mat[5])+"\r\n"+
00549                 "                    "+To_StringE(Interact_Mat[6])+" "+To_StringE(Interact_Mat[7])+" "+To_StringE(Interact_Mat[8])+" ];\r\n";   
00550 }

00558         EigenVectorsText=gcnew String("eigenvectors=[ ");
00559

00562         textBoxEigenVal2->Text= To_String(eigenval[1]);
00563         textBoxEigenVal3->Text= To_String(eigenval[2]);
00564

00570         textBoxXYEigenVec->Text= To_String(eigenvec[1]);

00572         textBoxYXEigenVec->Text= To_String(eigenvec[3]);
00573         textBoxYYEigenVec->Text= To_String(eigenvec[4]);
00574         textBoxYZEigenVec->Text= To_String(eigenvec[5]);
00575         textBoxZXEigenVec->Text= To_String(eigenvec[6]);
00576         textBoxZYEigenVec->Text= To_String(eigenvec[7]);
00577         textBoxZZEigenVec->Text= To_String(eigenvec[8]);
00578

00584 
00585 /**
00586 * @brief Function for calculating and updateing isotropic parameters textboxes. 
00587 * Call after calculating eigenvalues
00588 */
00589 void SpinachGUI::OrientationDialog::UpdateIsotropic()
00590 {
00591         double temp=0.0;
00592         ConventionsText=gcnew String("");
00593 
00594         //Isotropic: calculation, updating textbox, Write to matlab format
00595         temp=(eigenval[0]+eigenval[1]+eigenval[2])/3.0;
00596         textBoxIso->Text= To_String(temp);
00597         ConventionsText+="isotropic= "+To_StringE(temp)+" ; \r\n";
00598 
00599         //Axiality: calculation, updating textbox, Write to matlab format
00600         temp=2.0*eigenval[2]-(eigenval[0]+eigenval[1]);
00601         textBoxAx->Text= To_String(temp);
00602         ConventionsText+="axiality= "+To_StringE(temp)+" ; \r\n";
00603 
00604         //Rhombicity: calculation, updating textbox, Write to matlab format
00605         temp=eigenval[0]-eigenval[1];
00606         textBoxRh->Text= To_String(temp);
00607         ConventionsText+="rhombicity= "+To_StringE(temp)+" ; \r\n";
00608 
00609         //Span: calculation, updating textbox, Write to matlab format
00610         temp=eigenval[2]-eigenval[0];
00611         textBoxSp->Text= To_String(temp);
00612         ConventionsText+="span= "+To_StringE(temp)+" ; \r\n";
00613 
00614         //Skew: calculation, updating textbox, Write to matlab format
00615         temp=(eigenval[0]-2.0*eigenval[1]+eigenval[2])/(2*temp);
00616         textBoxSk->Text= To_String(temp);
00617         ConventionsText+="skew= "+To_StringE(temp)+" ; \r\n";
00618 }
00619 
00620 /**
00621 * @brief Function for calculating and updateing of spherical tensor textboxes. 
00622 * Call after calculating tensor
00623 */
00624 void SpinachGUI::OrientationDialog::UpdateSphericaTensor()
00625 {
00626         //Strings for the matlab export
00627         String^ sign, ^rank0, ^rank1,^rank2;
00628         SphericalTensorText=gcnew String("sphericaltensor");
00629         rank0=gcnew String(".rank0= ");
00630         rank1=gcnew String(".rank1=[ ");
00631         rank2=gcnew String(".rank2=[ ");
00632 
00633         //T2,2 : calculation, updating textbox
00634         Re_Spherical_Tens[4]=(Interact_Mat[0]-Interact_Mat[4])/2.0;
00635         Im_Spherical_Tens[4]=(-Interact_Mat[1]-Interact_Mat[3])/2.0;
00636         textBoxSpherical22R->Text= To_String(Re_Spherical_Tens[4]);
00637         textBoxSpherical22I->Text= To_String(Im_Spherical_Tens[4]);
00638 
00639         //Write to matlab format, checking if needed the + sign first
00640         sign=(Im_Spherical_Tens[4]<0?"":"+");
00641         rank2+=To_StringE(Re_Spherical_Tens[4])+sign+To_StringE(Im_Spherical_Tens[4])+"i \r\n";
00642 
00643         //T2,1 : calculation, updating textbox
00644         Re_Spherical_Tens[5]=-(Interact_Mat[2]+Interact_Mat[6])/2.0;
00645         Im_Spherical_Tens[5]=-(-Interact_Mat[5]-Interact_Mat[7])/2.0;
00646         textBoxSpherical21R->Text= To_String(Re_Spherical_Tens[5]);
00647         textBoxSpherical21I->Text= To_String(Im_Spherical_Tens[5]);
00648 
00649         //Write to matlab format, checking if needed the + sign first
00650         sign=(Im_Spherical_Tens[5]<0?"":"+");
00651         rank2+="                        "+To_StringE(Re_Spherical_Tens[5])+sign+To_StringE(Im_Spherical_Tens[5])+"i \r\n";
00652 
00653         //T1,1 : calculation, updating textbox
00654         Re_Spherical_Tens[1]=-(Interact_Mat[6]-Interact_Mat[2])/2.0;
00655         Im_Spherical_Tens[1]=-(-Interact_Mat[7]+Interact_Mat[5])/2.0;
00656         textBoxSpherical11R->Text= To_String(Re_Spherical_Tens[1]);
00657         textBoxSpherical11I->Text= To_String(Im_Spherical_Tens[1]);
00658 
00659         //Write to matlab format, checking if needed the + sign first
00660         sign=(Im_Spherical_Tens[1]<0?"":"+");
00661         rank1+=To_StringE(Re_Spherical_Tens[1])+sign+To_StringE(Im_Spherical_Tens[1])+"i \r\n";
00662 
00663         //T2,0 : calculation, updating textbox
00664         Re_Spherical_Tens[6]=(2.0*Interact_Mat[8]-Interact_Mat[0]-Interact_Mat[4])/sqrt(6.0);
00665         Im_Spherical_Tens[6]=0.0;
00666         textBoxSpherical20R->Text= To_String(Re_Spherical_Tens[6]);
00667         textBoxSpherical20I->Text= To_String(Im_Spherical_Tens[6]);
00668 
00669         //Write to matlab format, checking if needed the + sign first
00670         sign=(Im_Spherical_Tens[6]<0?"":"+");
00671         rank2+="                        "+To_StringE(Re_Spherical_Tens[6])+sign+To_StringE(Im_Spherical_Tens[6])+"i \r\n";
00672 
00673         //T1,0 : calculation, updating textbox
00674         Re_Spherical_Tens[2]=0.0;
00675         Im_Spherical_Tens[2]=-(Interact_Mat[1]-Interact_Mat[3])/sqrt(2.0);
00676         textBoxSpherical10R->Text= To_String(Re_Spherical_Tens[2]);
00677         textBoxSpherical10I->Text= To_String(Im_Spherical_Tens[2]);
00678 
00679         //Write to matlab format, checking if needed the + sign first
00680         sign=(Im_Spherical_Tens[2]<0?"":"+");
00681         rank1+="                        "+To_StringE(Re_Spherical_Tens[2])+sign+To_StringE(Im_Spherical_Tens[2])+"i  \r\n";
00682 
00683         //T0,0 : calculation, updating textbox
00684         Re_Spherical_Tens[0]=-(Interact_Mat[0]+Interact_Mat[4]+Interact_Mat[8])/sqrt(3.0);
00685         Im_Spherical_Tens[0]=0.0;
00686         textBoxSpherical00R->Text= To_String(Re_Spherical_Tens[0]);
00687         textBoxSpherical00I->Text= To_String(Im_Spherical_Tens[0]);
00688 
00689         //Write to matlab format, checking if needed the + sign first
00690         sign=(Im_Spherical_Tens[0]<0?"":"+");
00691         rank0+=To_StringE(Re_Spherical_Tens[0])+sign+To_StringE(Im_Spherical_Tens[0])+"i ;\r\n";
00692 
00693 
00694         //T2,-1 : calculation, updating textbox
00695         Re_Spherical_Tens[7]=(Interact_Mat[2]+Interact_Mat[6])/2.0;
00696         Im_Spherical_Tens[7]=(Interact_Mat[5]+Interact_Mat[7])/2.0;
00697         textBoxSpherical2n1R->Text= To_String(Re_Spherical_Tens[7]);
00698         textBoxSpherical2n1I->Text= To_String(Im_Spherical_Tens[7]);
00699 
00700         //Write to matlab format, checking if needed the + sign first
00701         sign=(Im_Spherical_Tens[7]<0?"":"+");
00702         rank2+="                        "+To_StringE(Re_Spherical_Tens[7])+sign+To_StringE(Im_Spherical_Tens[7])+"i  \r\n";
00703 
00704         //T1,-1 : calculation, updating textbox
00705         Re_Spherical_Tens[3]=-(Interact_Mat[6]-Interact_Mat[2])/2.0;
00706         Im_Spherical_Tens[3]=-(Interact_Mat[7]-Interact_Mat[5])/2.0;
00707         textBoxSpherical1n1R->Text= To_String(Re_Spherical_Tens[3]);
00708         textBoxSpherical1n1I->Text= To_String(Im_Spherical_Tens[3]);
00709 
00710         //Write to matlab format, checking if needed the + sign first
00711         sign=(Im_Spherical_Tens[3]<0?"":"+");
00712         rank1+="                        "+To_StringE(Re_Spherical_Tens[3])+sign+To_StringE(Im_Spherical_Tens[3])+"i ];\r\n";
00713 
00714         //T2,-2 : calculation, updating textbox
00715         Re_Spherical_Tens[8]=(Interact_Mat[0]-Interact_Mat[4])/2.0;
00716         Im_Spherical_Tens[8]=(Interact_Mat[1]+Interact_Mat[3])/2.0;
00717         textBoxSpherical2n2R->Text= To_String(Re_Spherical_Tens[8]);
00718         textBoxSpherical2n2I->Text= To_String(Im_Spherical_Tens[8]);
00719 
00720         //Write to matlab format, checking if needed the + sign first
00721         sign=(Im_Spherical_Tens[8]<0?"":"+");
00722         rank2+="                        "+To_StringE(Re_Spherical_Tens[8])+sign+To_StringE(Im_Spherical_Tens[8])+"i ]; \r\n";
00723 
00724         //Write the final matlab format
00725         SphericalTensorText=SphericalTensorText+rank2+
00726                 SphericalTensorText+rank1+
00727                 SphericalTensorText+rank0;
00728 }
00729 
00730 /**
00731 * @brief Function for updating Euler angle textboxes after calculating them from orientation.
00732 */
00733 void SpinachGUI::OrientationDialog::UpdateEulerAngles()
00734 {
00735         EulerAnglesText=gcnew String("eulerangles=[ ");
00736 
00737         //Get euler angles from orientation object
00738         EulerAngles^ euleran=nOrient->GetAsEuler();
00739 
00740         //Convert agles from grad to degrees
00741         alpha=float(180.0f*euleran->alpha/PI);
00742         beta=float(180.0f*euleran->beta/PI);
00743         gamma=float(180.0f*euleran->gamma/PI);
00744 
00745         //set the euler textboxes
00746         textBoxalpha->Text= To_String(alpha);
00747         textBoxbeta->Text= To_String(beta);
00748         textBoxgamma->Text= To_String(gamma);
00749 
00750         //Writing to matlab format
00751         EulerAnglesText+=To_StringE(alpha)+" "+To_StringE(beta)+" "+ To_StringE(gamma)+" ]; \r\n";
00752 }
00753 
00754 /**
00755 * @brief Function for calculating and updateing Wigner Matrix textboxes. 
00756 * Call after calculating eigenvalues
00757 */
00758 void SpinachGUI::OrientationDialog::UpdateWignerMatrix()
00759 {
00760         //Strings for the matlab export
00761         WignerMatrixText=gcnew String("wignermatrix=[ ");
00762         double Realtemp=0.0;
00763         double Imaginarytemp=0.0;
00764         double alpha, beta, gamma;
00765         String ^sign;
00766 
00767         //Take euler angles and convert them to gradiants.
00768         EulerAngles^ euleran=gcnew EulerAngles(this->alpha*PI/180.0f,this->beta*PI/180.0f,this->gamma*PI/180.0f);
00769         
00770         //Alpha angle: Transcade them to 1st quadrant
00771         if(euleran->alpha>=PI/2.0f && euleran->alpha<PI || euleran->alpha>=3.0f*PI/2.0f && euleran->alpha<2.0f*PI) 
00772                 alpha=PI/2.0f-fmod(euleran->alpha,(PI/2.0f));
00773         else alpha=fmod(euleran->alpha,(PI/2.0f));
00774 
00775         //Beta angle: Transcade them to 1st quadrant
00776         if(euleran->beta>=PI/2.0f && euleran->beta<PI || euleran->beta>=3.0f*PI/2.0f && euleran->beta<2.0f*PI) 
00777                 beta=fmod(euleran->beta,(PI/2.0f));
00778         else beta=fmod(euleran->beta,(PI/2.0f));
00779 
00780         //Gamma angle: Transcade them to 1st quadrant
00781         if(euleran->gamma>=PI/2.0f && euleran->gamma<PI || euleran->gamma>=3.0f*PI/2.0f && euleran->gamma<2.0f*PI) 
00782                 gamma=PI/2.0f-fmod(euleran->gamma,(PI/2.0f));
00783         else gamma=fmod(euleran->gamma,(PI/2.0f));
00784 
00785 
00786         //M[1,1] : calculation, updating textboxes
00787         Realtemp=pow(cos(beta/2.0),4)*cos(2.0*(alpha + gamma));
00788         Imaginarytemp=-(pow(cos(beta/2.),4)*sin(2*(alpha + gamma)));
00789         textBox60->Text= To_String(Realtemp);
00790         textBox59->Text= To_String(Imaginarytemp);
00791 
00792         //Write to matlab format, checking if needed the + sign first
00793         sign=(Imaginarytemp<0?"":"+");
00794         WignerMatrixText+=To_StringE(Realtemp)+sign+To_StringE(Imaginarytemp)+"i  ";
00795 
00796         //M[1,2] : calculation, updating textboxes
00797         Realtemp=(cos(alpha + 2*gamma)*(2*sin(beta) + sin(2*beta)))/4.;
00798         Imaginarytemp=-((2*sin(beta) + sin(2*beta))*sin(alpha + 2*gamma))/4.;
00799         textBox65->Text= To_String(Realtemp);
00800         textBox64->Text= To_String(Imaginarytemp);
00801 
00802         //Write to matlab format, checking if needed the + sign first
00803         sign=(Imaginarytemp<0?"":"+");
00804         WignerMatrixText+=To_StringE(Realtemp)+sign+To_StringE(Imaginarytemp)+"i  ";
00805 
00806         //M[1,3] : calculation, updating textboxes
00807         Realtemp=(sqrt(1.5)*cos(2*gamma)*pow(sin(beta),2))/2.;
00808         Imaginarytemp=-(sqrt(1.5)*cos(gamma)*pow(sin(beta),2)*sin(gamma));
00809         textBox112->Text= To_String(Realtemp);
00810         textBox107->Text= To_String(Imaginarytemp);
00811 
00812         //Write to matlab format, checking if needed the + sign first
00813         sign=(Imaginarytemp<0?"":"+");
00814         WignerMatrixText+=To_StringE(Realtemp)+sign+To_StringE(Imaginarytemp)+"i  ";
00815 
00816         //M[1,4] : calculation, updating textboxes
00817         Realtemp=cos(alpha - 2*gamma)*pow(sin(beta/2.),2)*sin(beta);
00818         Imaginarytemp=pow(sin(beta/2.),2)*sin(beta)*sin(alpha - 2*gamma);
00819         textBox111->Text= To_String(Realtemp);
00820         textBox110->Text= To_String(Imaginarytemp);
00821 
00822         //Write to matlab format, checking if needed the + sign first
00823         sign=(Imaginarytemp<0?"":"+");
00824         WignerMatrixText+=To_StringE(Realtemp)+sign+To_StringE(Imaginarytemp)+"i  ";
00825 
00826         //M[1,5] : calculation, updating textboxes
00827         Realtemp=cos(2*alpha - 2*gamma)*pow(sin(beta/2.),4);
00828         Imaginarytemp=pow(sin(beta/2.),4)*sin(2*alpha - 2*gamma);
00829         textBox109->Text= To_String(Realtemp);
00830         textBox108->Text= To_String(Imaginarytemp);
00831 
00832         //Write to matlab format, checking if needed the + sign first
00833         sign=(Imaginarytemp<0?"":"+");
00834         WignerMatrixText+=To_StringE(Realtemp)+sign+To_StringE(Imaginarytemp)+"i \r\n";
00835 
00836         ////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00837         //M[2,1] : calculation, updating textboxes
00838         Realtemp=-(cos(2*alpha + gamma)*(2*sin(beta) + sin(2*beta)))/4.;
00839         Imaginarytemp=((2*sin(beta) + sin(2*beta))*sin(2*alpha + gamma))/4.;
00840         textBox47->Text= To_String(Realtemp);
00841         textBox46->Text= To_String(Imaginarytemp);
00842 
00843         //Write to matlab format, checking if needed the + sign first
00844         sign=(Imaginarytemp<0?"":"+");
00845         WignerMatrixText+="               "+To_StringE(Realtemp)+sign+To_StringE(Imaginarytemp)+"i  ";
00846 
00847         //M[2,2] : calculation, updating textboxes
00848         Realtemp=((cos(beta) + cos(2*beta))*cos(alpha + gamma))/2.;
00849         Imaginarytemp=-((cos(beta) + cos(2*beta))*sin(alpha + gamma))/2.;
00850         textBox58->Text= To_String(Realtemp);
00851         textBox57->Text= To_String(Imaginarytemp);
00852 
00853         //Write to matlab format, checking if needed the + sign first
00854         sign=(Imaginarytemp<0?"":"+");
00855         WignerMatrixText+=To_StringE(Realtemp)+sign+To_StringE(Imaginarytemp)+"i  ";
00856 
00857         //M[2,3] : calculation, updating textboxes
00858         Realtemp=sqrt(1.5)*cos(beta)*cos(gamma)*sin(beta);
00859         Imaginarytemp=-(sqrt(1.5)*cos(beta)*sin(beta)*sin(gamma));
00860         textBox102->Text= To_String(Realtemp);
00861         textBox97->Text= To_String(Imaginarytemp);
00862 
00863         //Write to matlab format, checking if needed the + sign first
00864         sign=(Imaginarytemp<0?"":"+");
00865         WignerMatrixText+=To_StringE(Realtemp)+sign+To_StringE(Imaginarytemp)+"i  ";
00866 
00867         //M[2,4] : calculation, updating textboxes
00868         Realtemp=((cos(beta) - cos(2*beta))*cos(alpha - gamma))/2.;
00869         Imaginarytemp=((cos(beta) - cos(2*beta))*sin(alpha - gamma))/2.;
00870         textBox106->Text= To_String(Realtemp);
00871         textBox105->Text= To_String(Imaginarytemp);
00872 
00873         //Write to matlab format, checking if needed the + sign first
00874         sign=(Imaginarytemp<0?"":"+");
00875         WignerMatrixText+=To_StringE(Realtemp)+sign+To_StringE(Imaginarytemp)+"i  ";
00876 
00877         //M[2,5] : calculation, updating textboxes
00878         Realtemp=cos(2*alpha - gamma)*pow(sin(beta/2.),2)*sin(beta);
00879         Imaginarytemp=pow(sin(beta/2.),2)*sin(beta)*sin(2*alpha - gamma);
00880         textBox104->Text= To_String(Realtemp);
00881         textBox103->Text= To_String(Imaginarytemp);
00882 
00883         //Write to matlab format, checking if needed the + sign first
00884         sign=(Imaginarytemp<0?"":"+");
00885         WignerMatrixText+=To_StringE(Realtemp)+sign+To_StringE(Imaginarytemp)+"i \r\n";
00886 
00887         ////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00888         //M[3,1] : calculation, updating textboxes
00889         Realtemp=(sqrt(1.5)*cos(2*alpha)*pow(sin(beta),2))/2.;
00890         Imaginarytemp=-(sqrt(1.5)*cos(alpha)*sin(alpha)*pow(sin(beta),2));
00891         textBox62->Text= To_String(Realtemp);
00892         textBox61->Text= To_String(Imaginarytemp);
00893 
00894         //Write to matlab format, checking if needed the + sign first
00895         sign=(Imaginarytemp<0?"":"+");
00896         WignerMatrixText+="               "+To_StringE(Realtemp)+sign+To_StringE(Imaginarytemp)+"i  ";
00897 
00898         //M[3,2] : calculation, updating textboxes
00899         Realtemp=-(sqrt(1.5)*cos(alpha)*cos(beta)*sin(beta));
00900         Imaginarytemp=sqrt(1.5)*cos(beta)*sin(alpha)*sin(beta);
00901         textBox50->Text= To_String(Realtemp);
00902         textBox49->Text= To_String(Imaginarytemp);
00903 
00904         //Write to matlab format, checking if needed the + sign first
00905         sign=(Imaginarytemp<0?"":"+");
00906         WignerMatrixText+=To_StringE(Realtemp)+sign+To_StringE(Imaginarytemp)+"i  ";
00907 
00908         //M[3,3] : calculation, updating textboxes
00909         Realtemp=(1 + 3*cos(2*beta))/4.;
00910         Imaginarytemp=0.0;
00911         textBox56->Text= To_String(Realtemp);
00912         textBox53->Text= To_String(Imaginarytemp);
00913 
00914         //Write to matlab format, checking if needed the + sign first
00915         sign=(Imaginarytemp<0?"":"+");
00916         WignerMatrixText+=To_StringE(Realtemp)+sign+To_StringE(Imaginarytemp)+"i  ";
00917 
00918         //M[3,4] : calculation, updating textboxes
00919         Realtemp=sqrt(1.5)*cos(alpha)*cos(beta)*sin(beta);
00920         Imaginarytemp=sqrt(1.5)*cos(beta)*sin(alpha)*sin(beta);
00921         textBox96->Text= To_String(Realtemp);
00922         textBox95->Text= To_String(Imaginarytemp);
00923 
00924         //Write to matlab format, checking if needed the + sign first
00925         sign=(Imaginarytemp<0?"":"+");
00926         WignerMatrixText+=To_StringE(Realtemp)+sign+To_StringE(Imaginarytemp)+"i  ";
00927 
00928         //M[3,5] : calculation, updating textboxes
00929         Realtemp=(sqrt(1.5)*cos(2*alpha)*pow(sin(beta),2))/2.;
00930         Imaginarytemp=sqrt(1.5)*cos(alpha)*sin(alpha)*pow(sin(beta),2);
00931         textBox94->Text= To_String(Realtemp);
00932         textBox93->Text= To_String(Imaginarytemp);
00933 
00934         //Write to matlab format, checking if needed the + sign first
00935         sign=(Imaginarytemp<0?"":"+");
00936         WignerMatrixText+=To_StringE(Realtemp)+sign+To_StringE(Imaginarytemp)+"i \r\n";
00937 
00938         ////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00939         //M[4,1] : calculation, updating textboxes
00940         Realtemp=-(cos(2*alpha - gamma)*pow(sin(beta/2.),2)*sin(beta));
00941         Imaginarytemp=pow(sin(beta/2.),2)*sin(beta)*sin(2*alpha - gamma);
00942         textBox67->Text= To_String(Realtemp);
00943         textBox66->Text= To_String(Imaginarytemp);
00944 
00945         //Write to matlab format, checking if needed the + sign first
00946         sign=(Imaginarytemp<0?"":"+");
00947         WignerMatrixText+="               "+To_StringE(Realtemp)+sign+To_StringE(Imaginarytemp)+"i  ";
00948 
00949         //M[4,2] : calculation, updating textboxes
00950         Realtemp=((cos(beta) - cos(2*beta))*cos(alpha - gamma))/2.;
00951         Imaginarytemp=((-cos(beta) + cos(2*beta))*sin(alpha - gamma))/2.;
00952         textBox45->Text= To_String(Realtemp);
00953         textBox44->Text= To_String(Imaginarytemp);
00954 
00955         //Write to matlab format, checking if needed the + sign first
00956         sign=(Imaginarytemp<0?"":"+");
00957         WignerMatrixText+=To_StringE(Realtemp)+sign+To_StringE(Imaginarytemp)+"i  ";
00958 
00959         //M[4,3] : calculation, updating textboxes
00960         Realtemp=-(sqrt(1.5)*cos(beta)*cos(gamma)*sin(beta));
00961         Imaginarytemp=-(sqrt(1.5)*cos(beta)*sin(beta)*sin(gamma));
00962         textBox48->Text= To_String(Realtemp);
00963         textBox43->Text= To_String(Imaginarytemp);
00964 
00965         //Write to matlab format, checking if needed the + sign first
00966         sign=(Imaginarytemp<0?"":"+");
00967         WignerMatrixText+=To_StringE(Realtemp)+sign+To_StringE(Imaginarytemp)+"i  ";
00968 
00969         //M[4,4] : calculation, updating textboxes
00970         Realtemp=((cos(beta) + cos(2*beta))*cos(alpha + gamma))/2.;
00971         Imaginarytemp=((cos(beta) + cos(2*beta))*sin(alpha + gamma))/2.;
00972         textBox79->Text= To_String(Realtemp);
00973         textBox76->Text= To_String(Imaginarytemp);
00974 
00975         //Write to matlab format, checking if needed the + sign first
00976         sign=(Imaginarytemp<0?"":"+");
00977         WignerMatrixText+=To_StringE(Realtemp)+sign+To_StringE(Imaginarytemp)+"i  ";
00978 
00979         //M[4,5] : calculation, updating textboxes
00980         Realtemp=(cos(2*alpha + gamma)*(2*sin(beta) + sin(2*beta)))/4.;
00981         Imaginarytemp=((2*sin(beta) + sin(2*beta))*sin(2*alpha + gamma))/4.;
00982         textBox73->Text= To_String(Realtemp);
00983         textBox70->Text= To_String(Imaginarytemp);
00984 
00985         //Write to matlab format, checking if needed the + sign first
00986         sign=(Imaginarytemp<0?"":"+");
00987         WignerMatrixText+=To_StringE(Realtemp)+sign+To_StringE(Imaginarytemp)+"i \r\n";
00988 
00989         ////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00990         //M[5,1] : calculation, updating textboxes
00991         Realtemp=cos(2*alpha - 2*gamma)*pow(sin(beta/2.),4);
00992         Imaginarytemp=-(pow(sin(beta/2.),4)*sin(2*alpha - 2*gamma));
00993         textBox52->Text= To_String(Realtemp);
00994         textBox51->Text= To_String(Imaginarytemp);
00995 
00996         //Write to matlab format, checking if needed the + sign first
00997         sign=(Imaginarytemp<0?"":"+");
00998         WignerMatrixText+="               "+To_StringE(Realtemp)+sign+To_StringE(Imaginarytemp)+"i  ";
00999 
01000         //M[5,2] : calculation, updating textboxes
01001         Realtemp=-(cos(alpha - 2*gamma)*pow(sin(beta/2.),2)*sin(beta));
01002         Imaginarytemp=pow(sin(beta/2.),2)*sin(beta)*sin(alpha - 2*gamma);
01003         textBox55->Text= To_String(Realtemp);
01004         textBox54->Text= To_String(Imaginarytemp);
01005 
01006         //Write to matlab format, checking if needed the + sign first
01007         sign=(Imaginarytemp<0?"":"+");
01008         WignerMatrixText+=To_StringE(Realtemp)+sign+To_StringE(Imaginarytemp)+"i  ";
01009 
01010         //M[5,3] : calculation, updating textboxes
01011         Realtemp=(sqrt(1.5)*cos(2*gamma)*pow(sin(beta),2))/2.;
01012         Imaginarytemp=sqrt(1.5)*cos(gamma)*pow(sin(beta),2)*sin(gamma);
01013         textBox92->Text= To_String(Realtemp);
01014         textBox63->Text= To_String(Imaginarytemp);
01015 
01016         //Write to matlab format, checking if needed the + sign first
01017         sign=(Imaginarytemp<0?"":"+");
01018         WignerMatrixText+=To_StringE(Realtemp)+sign+To_StringE(Imaginarytemp)+"i  ";
01019 
01020         //M[5,4] : calculation, updating textboxes
01021         Realtemp=-(cos(alpha + 2*gamma)*(2*sin(beta) + sin(2*beta)))/4.;
01022         Imaginarytemp=-((2*sin(beta) + sin(2*beta))*sin(alpha + 2*gamma))/4.;
01023         textBox101->Text= To_String(Realtemp);
01024         textBox100->Text= To_String(Imaginarytemp);
01025 
01026         //Write to matlab format, checking if needed the + sign first
01027         sign=(Imaginarytemp<0?"":"+");
01028         WignerMatrixText+=To_StringE(Realtemp)+sign+To_StringE(Imaginarytemp)+"i  ";
01029 
01030         //M[5,5] : calculation, updating textboxes
01031         Realtemp=pow(cos(beta/2.),4)*cos(2*(alpha + gamma));
01032         Imaginarytemp=pow(cos(beta/2.),4)*sin(2*(alpha + gamma));
01033         textBox99->Text= To_String(Realtemp);
01034         textBox98->Text= To_String(Imaginarytemp);
01035 
01036         //Write to matlab format, checking if needed the + sign first
01037         sign=(Imaginarytemp<0?"":"+");
01038         WignerMatrixText+=To_StringE(Realtemp)+sign+To_StringE(Imaginarytemp)+"i ]; \r\n";
01039 }

01059                 To_StringE(quater->y)+" "+ To_StringE(quater->z)+" ]; \r\n";
01060 }

01095 /**
01096 * brief Function for updating all the dialog's textboxes after calculating the appropriate  orientation.
01097 */
01098 void SpinachGUI::OrientationDialog::UpdateAll()
01099 {
01100         //Interaction matrix and eigen
01101         UpdateInteraction();
01102         Calculate_Eigen();
01103         UpdateEigenState();
01104         UpdateIsotropic();
01105         UpdateSphericaTensor();
01106 
01107         //Orientation, euler angles, Wingner Matrix, quaternion and angles axis parameters
01108         CreateOrient();
01109         UpdateEulerAngles();
01110         UpdateWignerMatrix();
01111         UpdateQuaternion();
01112         UpdateAngleAxis();
01113 
01114         //Parameters
01115         UpdateParameters();
01116 }

01120 #pragma region "Calculations and 3d model update"
01121 
01122 /**
01123 * @brief Function for calculating  eigen vector and eigen values from tensor matrix.
01124 */
01125 void SpinachGUI::OrientationDialog::Calculate_Eigen()
01126 {
01127         //Migrate matrix to eigen matrix
01128         Matrix3d A;
01129         A<<Interact_Mat[0],Interact_Mat[1],Interact_Mat[2],
01130                 Interact_Mat[3],Interact_Mat[4],Interact_Mat[5],
01131                 Interact_Mat[6],Interact_Mat[7],Interact_Mat[8];
01132 
01133         //Set eigen solver ans solve 
01134         SelfAdjointEigenSolver<Matrix3d> eigensolver(A);
01135         if (eigensolver.info() != Success) abort();
01136         //Migrate eigen matrix to matrix, eigen values
01137         eigenval[0]=eigensolver.eigenvalues()[0];
01138         eigenval[1]=eigensolver.eigenvalues()[1];
01139         eigenval[2]=eigensolver.eigenvalues()[2];
01140 
01141         //dcm
01142         //In order to work correcly, according to Spinach
01143         eigenvec[0]=eigensolver.eigenvectors()(0);
01144         eigenvec[1]=eigensolver.eigenvectors()(3);
01145         eigenvec[2]=-eigensolver.eigenvectors()(6);
01146         eigenvec[3]=eigensolver.eigenvectors()(1);
01147         eigenvec[4]=eigensolver.eigenvectors()(4);
01148         eigenvec[5]=-eigensolver.eigenvectors()(7);
01149         eigenvec[6]=eigensolver.eigenvectors()(2);
01150         eigenvec[7]=eigensolver.eigenvectors()(5);
01151         eigenvec[8]=-eigensolver.eigenvectors()(8);
01152 }
01153 
01154 /**
01155 * @brief Function for calculating  tensor matrix from eigen vector(dcm) and eigen values.
01156 */
01157 void SpinachGUI::OrientationDialog::Calculate_TensorfromEigen()
01158 {
01159         Matrix3d result,eigenVectors,eigenValues;
01160 
01161         //Migrate matrix to eigen matrix
01162         //In order to work correcly, according to Spinach
01163         eigenVectors(0)=eigenvec[0];
01164         eigenVectors(1)=eigenvec[3];
01165         eigenVectors(2)=eigenvec[6];
01166         eigenVectors(3)=eigenvec[1];
01167         eigenVectors(4)=eigenvec[4];
01168         eigenVectors(5)=eigenvec[7];
01169         eigenVectors(6)=eigenvec[2];
01170         eigenVectors(7)=eigenvec[5];
01171         eigenVectors(8)=eigenvec[8];
01172 
01173         //Migrate matrix to eigen matrix
01174         eigenValues(0)=eigenval[0];
01175         eigenValues(1)=0.0;
01176         eigenValues(2)=0.0;
01177         eigenValues(3)=0.0;
01178         eigenValues(4)=eigenval[1];
01179         eigenValues(5)=0.0;
01180         eigenValues(6)=0.0;
01181         eigenValues(7)=0.0;
01182         eigenValues(8)=eigenval[2];
01183 
01184         //Multiply D*E*D^T
01185         result= (eigenVectors*eigenValues)*eigenVectors.transpose();
01186 
01187         //Migrate eigen matrix to matrix
01188         for(int j=0;j<9;j++) Interact_Mat[j]=result(j);
01189 }
01190 
01191 /**
01192 * @brief Function for setting up orientation object from dcm matrix.
01193 */
01194 void SpinachGUI::OrientationDialog::CreateOrient()
01195 {
01196         Matrix3x3^ AA=gcnew Matrix3x3();
01197 
01198         //Calculate the determinant of DCM
01199         double detA= eigenvec[0]*eigenvec[4]*eigenvec[8]
01200         -eigenvec[0]*eigenvec[5]*eigenvec[7]
01201         -eigenvec[3]*eigenvec[1]*eigenvec[8]
01202         +eigenvec[3]*eigenvec[2]*eigenvec[7]
01203         +eigenvec[6]*eigenvec[1]*eigenvec[5]
01204         -eigenvec[6]*eigenvec[4]*eigenvec[2];
01205 
01206         //setup sigh of det
01207         if(detA>0) detA=1.0f; else detA=-1.0f;
01208 
01209         //Translate DCM multiplied by its determinant to a Matrix3x3 matrix
01210         AA->xx=detA*eigenvec[0];AA->xy=detA*eigenvec[1];AA->xz=detA*eigenvec[2];
01211         AA->yx=detA*eigenvec[3];AA->yy=detA*eigenvec[4];AA->yz=detA*eigenvec[5];
01212         AA->zx=detA*eigenvec[6];AA->zy=detA*eigenvec[7];AA->zz=detA*eigenvec[8];
01213 
01214         //Setup the initial Orientation object
01215         nOrient= gcnew SpinachGUI::Orientation(AA);
01216 }
01217 
01218 /**
01219 * @brief Function for updating the tensor matrix in the model and repaint 3d model
01220 */
01221 void SpinachGUI::OrientationDialog::UpdateModel() 
01222 {
01223         //update tensor matrix in the model
01224         for (int i=0;i<9;i++) tensor->matrix3x3[i]=Interact_Mat[i];
01225 
01226         //Repaint only interaction draw lists in OpenGL
01227         Update(true);
01228         OpenGL->UpdateDisplay(UpdateType::ELLIPSOIDS);
01229         OpenGL->UpdateDisplay(UpdateType::BONDS_LIKE);
01230 }

01251 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
01252 */
01253 System::Void SpinachGUI::OrientationDialog::RemoveAnisbutton_Click(System::Object^  sender, System::EventArgs^  e)

01256         textBoxSpherical22I->Text= To_String(0.00000);           
01257         textBoxSpherical_KeyPress(textBoxSpherical22I,gcnew KeyPressEventArgs((char)13)) ;
01258         textBoxSpherical22R->Text= To_String(0.00000);
01259         textBoxSpherical_KeyPress(textBoxSpherical22R,gcnew KeyPressEventArgs((char)13)) ;
01260 
01261         //Set T[2,1]  real and imaginary part to zero and update
01262         textBoxSpherical21I->Text= To_String(0.00000);
01263         textBoxSpherical_KeyPress(textBoxSpherical21I,gcnew KeyPressEventArgs((char)13)) ;
01264         textBoxSpherical21R->Text= To_String(0.00000);
01265         textBoxSpherical_KeyPress(textBoxSpherical21R, gcnew KeyPressEventArgs((char)13)) ;
01266 
01267         //Set T[2,0] real part to zero and update
01268         textBoxSpherical20R->Text= To_String(0.00000);
01269         textBoxSpherical_KeyPress(textBoxSpherical20R, gcnew KeyPressEventArgs((char)13)) ;

01272 /**
01273 * @brief EventHandler for button for making this interaction the lab frame 
01274 * and update all the orientation in this dialog and 3d Model.
01275 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
01276 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
01277 */
01278 System::Void SpinachGUI::OrientationDialog::Alignmentbutton_Click(System::Object^  sender, System::EventArgs^  e)
01279 {
01280         //Make this interaction lab frame
01281         OpenGL->SystemModel->MakeInteractionLabFrame(tensor->getID());
01282 
01283         //update the whole dialog
01284         UpdateAll();
01285         //Update drawing list in openGL
01286         OpenGL->UpdateDisplay(UpdateType::ALL);
01287 }
